channel.title: Css on Ogden Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Css on Ogden Studios

item.title: SSDP Chapter Activity Tracker
item.description: Students for Sensible Drug Policy had an extremely bloated and broken WordPress installation. An outside firm had come in and done an absolutely horrendous job with the site’s redesign, and afterwards we were unsure what to do. At the moment, I’m working on migrating us from WordPress to a headless CMS with a Hugo static site generator.
